pageProduct.name: Alkira Hydra+ Moisture Restoring Night Cream 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Infused with eight nourishing oils + creamy butters + antioxidants + powerful plant actives. An essential fatty acid and vitamin C rich cream delivering triple duty beauty by hydrating, protecting and clearing the complexion.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Australian native complex of Lilly Pilly and Desert Lime delivering vitamin C and EFA rich Kangaroo Paw • Flavone Glycosides and Ferulic Acid - potent antioxidants to fight free radical damage and protect skin • Naturally occurring natives rich in vitamin C and AHA’s to reveal clear skin • Essential fatty acids and phytonutrients to strengthen the skin’s barrier and lock in moisture • Antioxidant rich Rosehip and Borage to defend against the everyday stressors • A hyper hydration combination of creamy Shea, Cocoa, Avocado, Sesame and Jojoba to offer long lasting moisture and a protective layer that ensures you wake up with silky soft skin.

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Arctium Lappa (Burdock) Root Extract, Syzygium Luehmannii (Lilly Pilly) Fruit Extract, Anigozanthos Flavidus (Kangaroo Paw) Flower/Leaf Extract, Vanillin, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene* Linalool* Geraniol**Allergens

Directions

After cleansing at night, gently massage into face, neck and décolletage
